about_the_game:
The VIP Supporter Pack unlocks exclusive content and supports us and our development!

Unlock 3 exclusive normal ships and 3 exclusive supercharged ships instantly!

Earn double XP forever!

Unlock the free revives modifier!

Support us and our development and help us release future updates!
detailed_description:
The VIP Supporter Pack unlocks exclusive content and supports us and our development!

Unlock 3 exclusive normal ships and 3 exclusive supercharged ships instantly!

Earn double XP forever!

Unlock the free revives modifier!

Support us and our development and help us release future updates!

name: Bolide - VIP Supporter Pack
short_description: The VIP Supporter Pack unlocks exclusive content and supports us and our development! Unlock 3 exclusive normal ships and 3 exclusive supercharged ships for free. Earn Double XP Forever! Unlock the free revives modifier. Support us and our development and help us release future updates!
